The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Tuesday 

Cream Pumpkin Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (pumpkin, white onion, carrot, celery, potato, coconut milk, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Mushrooms Soutte with Millet Polenta – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 350 g (mushrooms, millet, onion, dill, tofu, cashew, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Hemp seeds & Tomato Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (white onion, millet, tomato, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Tiramisu – raw / fără gluten / 110 g (caju, cafea, cacao naturală, migdale, unt de cacao, tahini, vanilie, psyllium, miere nefiltrată)
